  • Manufacturing
  • Why Work for Us?

This team is responsible for manufacturing Safeway Consumer Brands products throughout the network of Safeway-owned plants in the United States and Canada.  In addition to manufacturing the products for sale in Safeway stores, the plants supply other retailers with Consumer Brands items, which are distributed through Safeway’s Lucerne Foods team.

Manufacturing and food processing facilities by type and location as of January 2, 2010
Plant Type U.S. Canada Total
Milk Plants 6 3 9
Bakery Plants 6 2 8
Ice Cream Plants 2 2 4
Cheese and meat packing plants - 2 2
Soft drink bottling plants 4 - 4
Fruit and vegetable processing plants 1 3 4
Cake commissary 1 - 1
Total 20 12 32
"There are new challenges every day and an unlimited opportunity for growth."
Maura
